physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is encased within a brown frame. There are brown and white borders between the photograph and the frame. The photograph depicts the image of two men. They are dressed similarly, in three-piece suits. The man to the left, who wears a tie, is looking at the man on the right, who wears a bowtie.
title_text: Sarkies Brothers Five Photos of Sarkies Family Members
